name: pinlightning
description: Build tools for the PinLightning WordPress theme

scripts.build:css: mkdir -p assets/css/dist && lightningcss --minify --bundle assets/css/critical.css -o assets/css/dist/critical.css && lightningcss --minify --bundle assets/css/main.css -o assets/css/dist/main.css
scripts.zip: npm run build && cd .. && zip -r pinlightning.zip Fast_wordpress_theme/ -x '*.git*' '*.env*' '*node_modules*' '*deploy.sh*'
